name: Don't Reinvent the Dice
description:
In this game you control the dice by literally making it roll over.

When you move the dice falls and the direction changes. You have to maneuver your way through 3 different Levels/Puzzles.

The game is available for Windows and Mac OS, if you are installing it on Mac OS be sure to use an unzipping program like The Unarchiver to open the .zip.
